name: Corpselight Moth
movement: 15 ft. walking, 15 ft. climbing, 60 ft. flying
description: A large moth with the ability to emit bright light from its abdomen, showcasing distinct wings and a sturdy body.
memorable: Can create difficult terrain and emits a magical wind that deals radiant damage, knocking enemies prone.
goals: Predatory behavior, attacking foes while supporting allies by illuminating the area and providing resistance.
relations: May be encountered alongside other radiant or predatory creatures.
environment: Typically found in places where it can fly freely, often in environments with low light.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances evasion and attack capabilities, and it deals radiant damage.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma hinder cognitive tasks and social interactions.
attacks: Multiattack capabilities with a Proboscis that inflicts both piercing and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Radiant Wind releases a magical wind dealing significant area damage and knocking enemies prone.
senses: Has tremorsense to locate creatures within 30 feet even without sight.
skills: Possesses keen senses related to smell, giving advantage on perception checks based on scent.
additional_information: Can create difficult terrain through its Downdraft ability.
Immunity to radiant damage provides an edge against certain foes.
Illuminates dark areas, enhancing tactical maneuvers.
Necrotic Dampening ability provides ally support against necrotic threats.
Spider Climb allows it to traverse difficult surfaces easily.
test_queries: large glowing moth that deals radiant damage
flying beast with tough natural armor
predatory moth that creates difficult terrain
moth that knocks enemies prone with wind
